General.Name: Arabian Food & Dairy Factories Company
General.Description: Arabian Food and Dairy Factories Company produces and sells a range of ice cream products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers its products under the Fadeco and Blumark brand names. Arabian Food & Dairy Factories Company was founded in 1979 and is based in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Arabian Food and Dairy Factories Company is a subsidiary of HAK Holding Company.
General.Address: First Industrial City, Dammam, Saudi Arabia, 32234
